scripts.predeploy: mkdir -p build && aws cloudformation package  --template-file ./src/cae-test1.cf.json --output-template build/cae-test1.yaml --s3-bucket cae-test1-deployment-artifacts
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name cae-test1 --template-file ./build/cae-test1.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
